snippet: Which New York City high school and playground bred the most major leaguers, and all about the Irish Alps in the Catskills.
abstract: FYI column answers questions about which New York City schools and parks sent the most players to Major League Baseball and the meaning of the phrase 'the Irish Alps' in reference to the Catskills.
lead_paragraph: Which New York City high school and playground bred the most major leaguers, and all about the Irish Alps in the Catskills.
